pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, March 27, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an iftar dinner with Muslim women leaders. He will be joined by the Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Youth, Marci Ien, and the Minister of Transport, Omar Alghabra.

Closed to media
